events.message: Customer reported a vehicle accident involving their car and another vehicle at a busy intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and involved parties.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim promptly and professionally.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps in the process.
The customer was requested to provide police report and photos of the vehicle damage for further processing.
All requested documents such as accident report and vehicle damage photos were successfully submitted by the claimant.
An investigation was initiated to assess the damage and clarify liability based on the submitted documentation.
Investigation concluded confirming the responsibility of the other driver, validating the claim's legitimacy.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and associated expenses was proposed to the insured customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction regarding the timely communication and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved after the customer accepted the settlement offer without any objections.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer's designated bank account promptly.
The auto accident claim was formally closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
All files and documentation related to the claim were archived in the system for future reference if required.
